#!/bin/bash
# Database Backup Tool Installation - PORT-KONFIGURATION KORRIGIERT

set -e

declare -r DIR="/mnt/server"
declare -r APP_DIR="${DIR}/db-backup-tool"

# Fest definiertes Repository

echo "================================================="
echo "DB BACKUP TOOL INSTALLATION (PORT-FIXED)"
echo "================================================="
echo "Repository: ${REPO_URL}"

echo "Features: Port-Fix + Enhanced SSL + Security"
echo "HTTP Port: ${HTTP_PORT:-8080}"
echo "HTTPS Port: ${HTTPS_PORT:-8443}"
echo "Let's Encrypt Port: ${LETSENCRYPT_PORT:-80}"
echo "================================================="

# System Dependencies
echo "[1/8] Installing system dependencies..."
apt update
apt install -y wget curl gnupg2 software-properties-common git openssl ca-certificates lsb-release

# Node.js
echo "[2/8] Installing Node.js 18..."
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash -
apt install -y nodejs

# Database Tools
echo "[3/8] Installing database tools..."
apt install -y mysql-client || echo "MySQL client optional"
apt install -y postgresql-client || echo "PostgreSQL client optional"
apt install -y mongodb-database-tools || echo "MongoDB tools optional"

# SSL Tools + Network Tools f√ºr Port-Checks
echo "[4/8] Installing SSL and network tools..."
apt install -y certbot openssl ca-certificates net-tools

# Git Setup
echo "[5/8] Configuring Git..."
git config --global init.defaultBranch main
git config --global user.name "DB Backup Tool"
git config --global user.email "backup@localhost"

# Repository Clone
echo "[6/8] Cloning repository..."
cd "${DIR}"
rm -rf "${APP_DIR}" 2>/dev/null || true
git clone -b "${REPO_BRANCH}" "${REPO_URL}" "${APP_DIR}"
cd "${APP_DIR}"

# Dependencies
echo "[7/8] Installing dependencies..."
npm cache clean --force
npm install --production --no-audit --no-fund

# Directory Setup
echo "Creating directories..."
mkdir -p backups logs config public ssl
chmod 700 ssl
chmod 755 backups logs config public

# SSL Setup mit Port-Konfiguration
echo "[8/8] Setting up SSL with port configuration..."
if [ "${SSL_SETUP_ON_START:-true}" = "true" ] && [ "${REQUIRE_HTTPS:-false}" = "true" ]; then
    echo "üîê SSL-Setup wird vorbereitet mit Port-Konfiguration..."
    
    # Port-Variablen setzen
    export SSL_DOMAIN="${SSL_DOMAIN:-localhost}"
    export SSL_METHOD="${SSL_METHOD:-selfsigned}"
    export SSL_KEY_SIZE="${SSL_KEY_SIZE:-4096}"
    export SSL_CERT_VALIDITY="${SSL_CERT_VALIDITY:-365}"
    export HTTP_PORT="${HTTP_PORT:-8080}"
    export HTTPS_PORT="${HTTPS_PORT:-8443}"
    export LETSENCRYPT_PORT="${LETSENCRYPT_PORT:-80}"
    
    echo "üåê Port-Konfiguration:"
    echo "   HTTP Port: ${HTTP_PORT}"
    echo "   HTTPS Port: ${HTTPS_PORT}"
    echo "   Let's Encrypt Port: ${LETSENCRYPT_PORT}"
    
    # Enhanced SSL-Setup Script mit Port-Fix erstellen
    cat > ./ssl-setup.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
set -e

# Port-Konfiguration aus Umgebungsvariablen
SSL_DOMAIN="${SSL_DOMAIN:-localhost}"
SSL_METHOD="${SSL_METHOD:-selfsigned}"
SSL_KEY_SIZE="${SSL_KEY_SIZE:-4096}"
SSL_CERT_VALIDITY="${SSL_CERT_VALIDITY:-365}"
HTTP_PORT="${HTTP_PORT:-8080}"
HTTPS_PORT="${HTTPS_PORT:-8443}"
LETSENCRYPT_PORT="${LETSENCRYPT_PORT:-80}"

echo "üîê SSL-Setup f√ºr ${SSL_DOMAIN} (Methode: ${SSL_METHOD})"
echo "üåê Port-Konfiguration: HTTP=${HTTP_PORT}, HTTPS=${HTTPS_PORT}, LE=${LETSENCRYPT_PORT}"

mkdir -p ssl
chmod 700 ssl

# Port-Verf√ºgbarkeit pr√ºfen
check_port() {
    local port=$1
    local name=$2
    echo "üîç Pr√ºfe Port ${port} (${name})..."
    
    if command -v netstat >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        if netstat -tlnp 2>/dev/null | grep -q ":${port} "; then
            echo "‚ö†Ô∏è Port ${port} ist belegt"
            return 1
        fi
    elif command -v ss >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        if ss -tlnp 2>/dev/null | grep -q ":${port} "; then
            echo "‚ö†Ô∏è Port ${port} ist belegt"
            return 1
        fi
    fi
    
    echo "‚úÖ Port ${port} verf√ºgbar"
    return 0
}

# HTTPS Port validieren
if ! check_port "${HTTPS_PORT}" "HTTPS"; then
    echo "‚ùå HTTPS Port ${HTTPS_PORT} ist nicht verf√ºgbar"
    echo "üí° Bitte anderen Port w√§hlen oder belegenden Service stoppen"
    exit 1
fi

if [ "${SSL_METHOD}" = "selfsigned" ]; then
    echo "üîÑ Erstelle Enhanced Self-Signed Zertifikat..."
    
    # Enhanced OpenSSL Config f√ºr Browser-Kompatibilit√§t
    cat > ssl/openssl.cnf << 'SSLCONF'
[req]
distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name
req_extensions = v3_req
prompt = no
x509_extensions = v3_ca

[req_distinguished_name]
C = DE
ST = NRW
L = Docker
O = DB Backup Tool
CN = DOMAIN_PLACEHOLDER

[v3_req]
basicConstraints = CA:FALSE
keyUsage = nonRepudiation, digitalSignature, keyEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage = serverAuth, clientAuth
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[v3_ca]
basicConstraints = CA:FALSE
keyUsage = nonRepudiation, digitalSignature, keyEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage = serverAuth, clientAuth
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[alt_names]
DNS.1 = DOMAIN_PLACEHOLDER
DNS.2 = localhost
IP.1 = 127.0.0.1
IP.2 = ::1
SSLCONF
    
    # Domain in Config einsetzen
    sed -i "s/DOMAIN_PLACEHOLDER/${SSL_DOMAIN}/g" ssl/openssl.cnf
    
    # Zertifikat erstellen mit Enhanced KeyUsage
    openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:${SSL_KEY_SIZE} \
        -keyout ssl/privkey.pem \
        -out ssl/fullchain.pem \
        -days ${SSL_CERT_VALIDITY} \
        -nodes \
        -config ssl/openssl.cnf \
        -extensions v3_ca
    
    rm -f ssl/openssl.cnf
    
    # Validierung
    if openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -text -noout | grep -q "digitalSignature"; then
        echo "‚úÖ Enhanced SSL-Zertifikat mit korrekter KeyUsage erstellt"
        echo "üåê Browser-Kompatibilit√§t: ERR_SSL_KEY_USAGE_INCOMPATIBLE behoben"
        echo "üö™ HTTPS Port: ${HTTPS_PORT}"
    else
        echo "‚ö†Ô∏è KeyUsage m√∂glicherweise nicht optimal"
    fi
    
elif [ "${SSL_METHOD}" = "letsencrypt" ]; then
    echo "üîÑ Let's Encrypt Setup mit Port-Konfiguration..."
    
    # Validierung f√ºr Let's Encrypt
    if [ "${SSL_DOMAIN}" = "localhost" ]; then
        echo "‚ùå Let's Encrypt funktioniert nicht mit localhost"
        echo "üîÑ Verwende Self-Signed Fallback"
        SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
        exec "$0"
    fi
    
    # Let's Encrypt Port pr√ºfen
    if ! check_port "${LETSENCRYPT_PORT}" "Let's Encrypt"; then
        echo "‚ö†Ô∏è Let's Encrypt Port ${LETSENCRYPT_PORT} belegt - stoppe Services"
        systemctl stop nginx 2>/dev/null || true
        systemctl stop apache2 2>/dev/null || true
        systemctl stop httpd 2>/dev/null || true
        
        sleep 2
        if ! check_port "${LETSENCRYPT_PORT}" "Let's Encrypt"; then
            echo "‚ùå Port ${LETSENCRYPT_PORT} konnte nicht freigegeben werden"
            echo "üîÑ Verwende Self-Signed Fallback"
            SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
            exec "$0"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Certbot installieren falls nicht vorhanden
    if ! command -v certbot >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "üì¶ Installiere Certbot..."
        apt-get update >/dev/null 2>&1
        apt-get install -y certbot >/dev/null 2>&1
    fi
    
    # Let's Encrypt Zertifikat holen
    echo "üì° Hole Let's Encrypt Zertifikat (Port: ${LETSENCRYPT_PORT})..."
    if certbot certonly --standalone --non-interactive --agree-tos \
        --email "${SSL_EMAIL:-admin@${SSL_DOMAIN}}" \
        --domains "${SSL_DOMAIN}" \
        --key-type rsa --rsa-key-size "${SSL_KEY_SIZE}" \
        --http-01-port "${LETSENCRYPT_PORT}"; then
        
        # Zertifikate kopieren
        if [ -d "/etc/letsencrypt/live/${SSL_DOMAIN}" ]; then
            cp "/etc/letsencrypt/live/${SSL_DOMAIN}/fullchain.pem" ssl/fullchain.pem
            cp "/etc/letsencrypt/live/${SSL_DOMAIN}/privkey.pem" ssl/privkey.pem
            echo "‚úÖ Let's Encrypt Zertifikat erstellt"
            echo "üö™ HTTPS Port: ${HTTPS_PORT}"
        else
            echo "‚ùå Let's Encrypt Zertifikat-Verzeichnis nicht gefunden"
            echo "üîÑ Verwende Self-Signed Fallback"
            SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
            exec "$0"
        fi
    else
        echo "‚ùå Let's Encrypt fehlgeschlagen"
        echo "üîÑ Verwende Self-Signed Fallback"
        SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
        exec "$0"
    fi
    
else
    echo "‚ö†Ô∏è SSL-Methode ${SSL_METHOD} - verwende Self-Signed Fallback"
    SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
    exec "$0"
fi

# Berechtigungen setzen
chmod 644 ssl/fullchain.pem 2>/dev/null || true
chmod 600 ssl/privkey.pem 2>/dev/null || true

# Validierung
if openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -text -noout >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "‚úÖ SSL-Zertifikat erfolgreich validiert"
    echo "üìã Zertifikat-Details:"
    openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -subject -dates -noout 2>/dev/null || echo "Details nicht verf√ºgbar"
    echo "üåê Port-Info:"
    echo "   HTTP: ${HTTP_PORT}"
    echo "   HTTPS: ${HTTPS_PORT}"
else
    echo "‚ùå SSL-Zertifikat ung√ºltig"
    exit 1
fi

echo "üéâ SSL-Setup mit Port-Konfiguration abgeschlossen!"
EOF
    
    chmod +x ./ssl-setup.sh
    
    # SSL-Setup ausf√ºhren
    echo "üîÑ F√ºhre SSL-Setup mit Port-Konfiguration aus..."
    if ./ssl-setup.sh; then
        echo "‚úÖ SSL-Setup erfolgreich"
        if [ -f "ssl/fullchain.pem" ] && [ -f "ssl/privkey.pem" ]; then
            echo "üîê HTTPS-Zertifikate erstellt"
            echo "üåê Enhanced Browser-Kompatibilit√§t aktiviert"
            echo "üö™ HTTPS Port: ${HTTPS_PORT}"
        fi
    else
        echo "‚ö†Ô∏è SSL-Setup fehlgeschlagen - HTTP Fallback aktiv"
    fi
else
    echo "‚ÑπÔ∏è SSL-Setup √ºbersprungen (deaktiviert)"
fi

# Finale Berechtigungen
chmod 755 .

chmod +x *.sh 2>/dev/null || true

# Grundlegende Dateien erstellen

if node -e "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8'))" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo "‚úÖ package.json g√ºltig"
else
    echo "‚ùå package.json ung√ºltig"
    exit 1
fi

echo "================================================="
echo "üéâ INSTALLATION ERFOLGREICH ABGESCHLOSSEN!"
echo "================================================="
echo "‚úÖ Repository: ${REPO_URL}"
echo "‚úÖ Branch: ${REPO_BRANCH}"
echo "‚úÖ Node.js: $(node --version 2>/dev/null || echo 'Unknown')"
echo "‚úÖ NPM: $(npm --version 2>/dev/null || echo 'Unknown')"
echo "‚úÖ Port-Fix: Dynamische Port-Konfiguration aktiviert"
echo "‚úÖ Enhanced SSL: Browser-Kompatibilit√§t verbessert"
echo "‚úÖ Security Features: 2FA, CAPTCHA, Rate Limiting"
echo "‚úÖ Database Support: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB"
echo "‚úÖ Git Backup: Unterst√ºtzt"
echo "‚úÖ Auto-Update: Aktiviert"

echo "üåê PORT-KONFIGURATION:"
echo "   HTTP Port: ${HTTP_PORT:-8080}"
echo "   HTTPS Port: ${HTTPS_PORT:-8443}"
echo "   Let's Encrypt Port: ${LETSENCRYPT_PORT:-80}"

if [ -f "ssl/fullchain.pem" ] && [ -f "ssl/privkey.pem" ]; then
    echo "üîê SSL Status: Zertifikate verf√ºgbar"
    echo "üåê Browser Fix: ERR_SSL_KEY_USAGE_INCOMPATIBLE behoben"
    echo "üö™ HTTPS verf√ºgbar auf Port: ${HTTPS_PORT:-8443}"
else
    echo "‚ÑπÔ∏è SSL Status: Wird beim ersten Start erstellt"
fi

echo "================================================="
echo "üöÄ SERVER BEREIT ZUM STARTEN!"
echo "üîß Konfiguration √ºber Pterodactyl Umgebungsvariablen"
echo "üìù Standard Login: admin / admin123 (bitte √§ndern!)"
echo "üåê URL: https://[deine-domain]:${HTTPS_PORT:-8443}"
